## ---- cosmo-seasons ----

\begin{tikzpicture}[dot/.style={draw,fill,circle,inner sep=1pt}]
	\tikzstyle{keydates} = [black];
	\def\angle{30} % angle at which X is placed
	\def\a{5} % large half axis
	\def\b{3} % small half axis
	\def\ellipse{(0,0) ellipse ({\a} and {\b})}
	
	\def\transj{\trad{days}{jours}}
	\coordinate (O) at (0,0);
	
	\begin{scope}[rotate=\angle]
		\node (F) at (2,0) {};	
	\end{scope}
	
	\foreach \corner in {(5,4), (-5,-4)}
	{
		\begin{scope}
			\clip (F) rectangle \corner;
			\fill[red!10!white, rotate=\angle] \ellipse;
		\end{scope}
	}
	\foreach \corner in {(-5,4), (5,-4)}
	{
		\begin{scope}
			\clip (F) rectangle \corner;
			\fill[green!10!white, rotate=\angle] \ellipse;
		\end{scope}
	}
	
	\draw[name path=ellipse, rotate=\angle] \ellipse;
	
	\begin{scope}[rotate=\angle]
		\node[rotate=-20,anchor=north,align=center] at (27:\a{} and \b) {\small \trad{winter}{hiver}\\\small 89 \transj};
		\node[rotate=22,anchor=north,align=center] at (75:\a{} and \b) {\small \trad{spring}{printemps}\\\small 92.8 \transj};
		\node[rotate=5,anchor=south west,align=center] at (220:\a{} and \b) {\small 93.6 \transj\\\small \trad{summer}{été}};
		\node[rotate=47,anchor=south east,align=center] at (310:\a{} and \b) {\small 89.8 \transj\\\small \trad{autumn}{automne}};
	\end{scope}
	
	\path[name path=equinox] (F |- 0,-4) -- (F |- 0,4);
	\path[name path=solstice] (-5,0 |- F) -- (5,0 |- F);
	\path[name path=apside] (\angle:5) -- (180+\angle:5);
	
	\draw[red,thick,name intersections={of=ellipse and solstice,by={summer,winter}}] (summer) -- (winter);
	\draw[green,thick,name intersections={of=ellipse and equinox,by={spring,autumn}}] (spring) -- (autumn);
	\draw[blue,thick,name intersections={of=ellipse and apside,by={periapse,apoapse}}] (periapse) -- (apoapse);
		
	\node (sun) at (F) {\includegraphics[width=1.6cm]{pictures/Cosmology/diagrams/sun_low}};
	
	\foreach \season in {winter, spring, summer, autumn, periapse, apoapse}
	{
		\begin{scope}[shift=(\season)]
			\draw[red,thick] (90-23.5:.7cm) -- (270-23.5:.7cm);
			\node[rotate=-23.5] at (0,0) {\includegraphics[width=1.2cm]{pictures/Cosmology/diagrams/earth_low}};
		\end{scope}
	}

	\node[keydates,right=.62cm,align=center] at (winter) {\small \trad{Winter solstice}{Solstice d'hiver}\\\small 21 \trad{December}{décembre}};
	\node[keydates,above=.62cm,right=.62cm,align=center] at (periapse) {\small Periapse\\\small 6 \trad{January}{janvier}};
	\node[keydates,above=.62cm,align=center] at (spring) {\small \trad{Spring equinox}{Equinoxe de printemps}\\\small 21 \trad{March}{mars}};
	\node[keydates,left=.62cm,align=center] at (summer) {\small \trad{Summer solstice}{Solstice d'été}\\\small 21 \trad{June}{juin}};
	\node[keydates,below=.62cm,left=.62cm,align=center] at (apoapse) {\small Apoapse\\\small 6 \trad{July}{juillet}};
	\node[keydates,below=.62cm,right=.4cm,anchor=north west,align=center] at (autumn) {\small \trad{Autumn equinox}{Equinoxe d'automne}\\\small 21 \trad{September}{septembre}};
\end{tikzpicture}
